In deciding who should take the business forward, we wanted someone with the right mix of leadership, vision and hard-core engineering chops, Steve Ballmer wrote in a Feb. 9 e-mail to employees.`` We wanted someone who could define the future of business computing and further expand our ability to bring the cloud to business customers and developers in game-changing ways.
